thread.title: BRIEF-Kennady Diamonds, Mountain Province Diamonds Received Final Approval Of Ontario Superior Court Of Justice For Their Proposed Business Combination

title: BRIEF-Kennady Diamonds, Mountain Province Diamonds Received Final Approval Of Ontario Superior Court Of Justice For Their Proposed Business Combination

organizations.name: mountain province diamonds received final approval of ontario superior court of justice
al of ontario superior court of justice for their proposed business combination reuters

text:
April 11 (Reuters) - Kennady Diamonds Inc:
* CO, MOUNTAIN PROVINCE DIAMONDS RECEIVED FINAL APPROVAL OF ONTARIO SUPERIOR COURT OF JUSTICE FOR THEIR PROPOSED BUSINESS COMBINATION
* CO AND MOUNTAIN PROVINCE DIAMONDS CURRENTLY ANTICIPATE CLOSING OF THEIR BUSINESS COMBINATION TO OCCUR ON APRIL 13 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
